data.title: Georgia Public Health Department
data.meta_description: District 4 Public Health: Protecting and improving the health of our community. Proudly serving the following counties in Georgia: Butts, Carroll, Coweta, Fayette, Heard, Henry, Lamar, Meriwether, Pike, Spalding, Troup and Upson.
data.meta_site_name: District 4 Public Health - Georgia Public Health Department
data.text:
VITAL RECORDS: Did you know you can order a birth certificate or death certificate online? We can mail it to you, or you can pick it up in person at the Carroll County Health Departmentâ€™s Vital Records office. Visit Carroll County Vital Records to get started.

COVID-19 TESTING AND VACCINES: A PCR test kit for COVID-19/flu A-B is available 24/7 at an outdoor self-service kiosk outside the University of West Georgia, Carrollton Campus, 1601 Maple St,, Carrollton. The specimens are picked up daily and sent to an accredited lab for PCR testing. Individuals will receive notification of their test results by email or text, usually within 48 hours of specimen collection. Though not required, pre-registration for testing at the kiosk is available at register.testandgo.com
